The '''Paimon Menu''' is the pause menu in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

==How to Unlock==
The Paimon Menu is unlocked after the [[Archon Quest]] [[Unexpected Power]] in the [[Prologue]]. More buttons get added as the player's [[Adventure Rank]] increases.

==Access==
The Paimon Menu can be accessed in the top left corner of the screen when in the Open World. It cannot be opened when in [[Domains]] and [[Spiral Abyss]].
